verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Praise Him! Praise Him! Tell of His excellent greatness! Praise Him! Praise Him! Ever in joyful song!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Praise Him! Praise Him! Jesus, our blessed Redeemer! Let our voices loud with Hosanna ring! Jesus, Savior, reigns in His kingdom forever. Crown Him! Crown Him! Prophet and Priest and King. Christ is coming, over the world victorious: Power and glory unto the Lord belong.{/lang-eng}
